Sentencas: Samples of Sn4+-substituted bismuth vanadate, formulated as Bi4SnxV2-xO11-(x/2)- in the composition range 0.07 x 0.30, were prepared by standard solid-state reactions.
Titulo: Correlation between phase structure and electrical conduction in BISNVOX system for intermediate temperature solid oxide fuel cells (IT-SOFC)

Sentencas: Sample characterization and the principal phase transitions ( , and ' ) were investigated by FT-IR spectroscopy, X-ray powder diffraction, differential thermal analysis (DTA) and AC impedance spectroscopy.
Titulo: Correlation between phase structure and electrical conduction in BISNVOX system for intermediate temperature solid oxide fuel cells (IT-SOFC)

Sentencas: For composition x = 0.07, the and phase transitions were observed at temperatures of 451 and 536 degrees C, respectively.
Titulo: Correlation between phase structure and electrical conduction in BISNVOX system for intermediate temperature solid oxide fuel cells (IT-SOFC)

Sentencas: DTA thermograms and Arrhenius plots of conductivities revealed the ' phase transition at 411 and 423 degrees C for x = 0.20 and 0.30, respectively.
Titulo: Correlation between phase structure and electrical conduction in BISNVOX system for intermediate temperature solid oxide fuel cells (IT-SOFC)

Sentencas: AC impedance plots showed that conductivity is mainly due to the grain contribution, which is evident in the enhanced short-range diffusion of oxide ion vacancy in the grains with increasing temperature.
Titulo: Correlation between phase structure and electrical conduction in BISNVOX system for intermediate temperature solid oxide fuel cells (IT-SOFC)

Sentencas: The highest ionic conductivity (5.03 x 10-5 S cm-1 at 300 degrees C) was observed for the x = 0.17 solid solution with less pronounced thermal hysteresis.
Titulo: Correlation between phase structure and electrical conduction in BISNVOX system for intermediate temperature solid oxide fuel cells (IT-SOFC)
